DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the head extension by an assistant decreases dental contact between laryngoscope blade and maxillary incisors during direct laryngoscopy
DOC.brief_title: Maintaining the Head Extension by an Assistant Decreases Dental Contact
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing surgery that requires general anesthesia disease or injury of cervical spine dentoalveolar injury history of difficult intubation anatomical anomaly of face or airway
